name: Satisfaction Guaranteed
description:
Satisfaction Guaranteed: A literal community builder!
As a neighborhood planner it's your job to find a middle ground for new residents before breaking ground. Drag and drop tile pieces to find peace!

This is an expanded and upgraded version of our original game jam entry from March 2022. 

This new release features 10 levels of community building puzzles, over 500 lines of dialogue, and a some new gameplay mechanics to spice things up. 

Can you satisfy everyone?

Team BiNANA Split:

Iain - Programming, Game Design, Additional Art & Sound, Project Management

GingerDee - Character Dialogue, Game Design

BibiXP - Music, Tile Art, Game Design 

Nanceh - UI, SFX,  Character Designs, Game Design

Game made using the Dialogic plugin for Godot
